mapper.select: select p.proj_title, p.proj_start_date, p.proj_reqr_skill, p.proj_estimate, p.proj_reqr_person, p.proj_work_place from project p, apply a where p.proj_id = a.proj_id

select p.proj_title, p.proj_reqr_skill, p.proj_career, p.proj_start_date, p.proj_end_date, count(p.proj_reqr_person) as proj_reqr_person from project p, apply a where p.proj_id = a.proj_id group by p.proj_title, p.proj_reqr_skill, p.proj_career, p.proj_start_date, p.proj_end_date
select p.proj_title, p.proj_work_place, p.proj_reqr_skill, p.proj_start_date from project p, apply a where p.proj_id = a.proj_id
